intro: Elatostema fengshanense var. fengshanense, commonly known as the Fengshan cushion plant, is a perennial herb native to China. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes plants commonly known as nettles. The plant is characterized by its dense rosette of small, fleshy leaves that form a compact cushion-like structure. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments, such as forest floors or rocky crevices. Its botanical features make it well adapted to its specific ecological niche.
